c.sp: library|Lac Courte Oreilles Tribal Code of Law|V|1|1.3|1.304

c.x: The Caucus will be held in the month of April of each year, on a date desig
Sign-in sheet available at entrance to the Peter Larson Room.
Call to order – Roll call.
Present name of nominator.
Nominator names nominee.
Floor opened for nominations of eligible citizens (members) of the Tribe fo
Chairman calls three (3) times for any additional nominees before floor is
Names of nominees are placed in a "hat" and drawn out for numeral order on
Present name of nominator.
Nominator names nominee.
Floor opens for nominations to fill six (6) positions on the Election Commi
Chairman calls three (3) times for any additional nominees before floor is
Election Caucus Procedure.
Only six (6) votes per ballot. If for any reason the ballot contains more t
The ballots shall be collected at each table.
Ballots tallied and marked on display chart.
Six (6) top vote getters are seated on Election Committee.
Two (2) next highest vote getters are designated as alternates.
The ballots shall be counted and cross referenced with the sign-in sheet to
Election Committee Voting Procedures. Secretaries shall pass out ballot to
Chairman adjourns caucus.

The petition submitted shall be in substantially the following form:
The petition shall bear the signature, printed name, address, and enrollmen
